name: Disco Rhythm Duel
description:
Use the arrow keys to control your fighter against an AI opponent.  The catch is that your fighter only responds to 4 beat chants.

Coded in a weekend for TOJam 2021 (Seems like a rerun)

Look for updates coming later in 2021 May: victory, AI, health meter, more sound effect, parallax, new characters and more.

A Team Sushi project by:

  • Dale Wick - Programmer & Cat Wrangler
  • Jillian Arnott - Programmer
  • Jeffrey Wick - Programmer
  • Joseph McCabe - Programmer
  • Cailan Thiara - Sprite Artist
  • Christine Laskowski, Vocals and Background Artist

Checkout http://teamsushi.org  for more TOJam projects.

Source at http://www.github.com/hardhat/rhythmduel
